summary: I wanted a boss fight that was more epic than what was on offer so I created this. It is a bat file to be put in the skyrim folder. This is as advanced a file as I can make and I want to add to the comunity.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a boss fight that was more epic than what was on offer so I created this. It is a bat file to be put in the skyrim folder. This is as advanced a file as I can make and I want to add to the comunity.
Now it is true that you can type in the codes seperatly in a boring waste of 5 mins, or you can simply type (Bat Fight) into the console ~ with out the ().
I\'m not going to tell you what will happen but I sugest you have a very high level character lol. I also sugest a place with a wide open space,
Try not to spoil the suprise for anyone people.

Also check out http://www.skyrimsearch.com/ if you want to tryout this type of thing yourself.
Don\'t forget to endorse if you like this :)
author: AbleOne
